name: Exeggutor

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.text: Switch Exeggutor with 1 of your Benched Pok√©mon.

attacks.name: Big Eggsplosion
attacks.text: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Exeggutor. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an Exeggcute.

strengths: Big Eggsplosion only costs 1 Colorless energy
Teleport allows retreat for 1 Psychic energy
Can attach many energy and deal massive damage
synergies: Energy acceleration - more energy = more coin flips
Double Colorless Energy - counts as 1 flip but powers up

competitiveHistory: Exeggutor from Jungle saw some competitive play due to its efficient Big Eggsplosion attack. With enough energy attached, it could deal significant damage for just 1 Colorless energy cost. The coin-flip nature made it inconsistent, but the potential for high damage output made it appealing in some builds.

rulings.ruling: Big Eggsplosion counts ALL energy cards attached to Exeggutor, not just the one used to pay for the attack.
Double Colorless Energy counts as 1 energy card, so you flip 1 coin for it, not 2.
Teleport can only be used if you have at least one Benched Pokemon.
